channel.title: [Animated] Nomad cape + chaotic crossbow [animated]
channel.description:
Requirements: 634 Model header
well, i had nomad cape + chaotic crossbow, but they werent animated, so i toke a look in the 634 models, and i tried them, and they were animated :)
Nomad cape picture: [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/3zub5.jpg[/img]
Chaotic crossbow picture: [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/ww12tv.jpg[/img]
credits: jagex - 99.9% for making the models me - 0.1% for finding them :D
ow and, if u like my armour im wearing ill add it in here, its basic decorative, but it looks really cool :D
Link: http://uppit.com/d6ebkkz63hxl/Crossbow_+_nomad.rar
Models: 45565 = Drop/Inv model from nomad cape 45576 = Male wear model from nomad cape 45578 = Female wear model from nomad cape
54331 = Drop/Inv model from Chaotic crossbow 56307 = Male/Female wear model from chaotic crossbow

item.title: [Animated] Nomad cape + chaotic crossbow [animated]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“medster, post:3, topic:394936”][quote author=Tobbescape link=topic=492127.msg3598695#msg3598695 date=1305366779]
case 16000:
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 54331;
itemDef.modelZoom = 2256;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 456;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 513;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt165 = 54331; //male wield model
itemDef.anInt200 = 56307; //femArmModel
itemDef.name = “Chaotic Crossbow”;
itemDef.description = “It’s a chaotic crossbow, worn by noobs.”.getBytes();//examine.
break;
[/quote]

What’s that? Im new to coding models.[/quote]
The ints to add into the client files.

Read full topic
